Title: Here's the Plan
Description:
$n, the time has come to deal with the nerubian army. General Zev'kall is massing a sizeable force to the east. He intends to  breach the wall and invade Hallowfall. There isn't much time.

We do not have the strength for an all-out assault. To that end, the Weaver has sent Gazlowe here to assist us. I'm willing to do what it takes to save my people.

And as fate would have it, I have a personal matter to attend to while we are there.
ObjectivesText: Help Faerin prepare while she explains her plan.
RewardText: I think the three of us will be enough for this. Lean and mean, right?
